com.quinsoft.zeidon.domains

Class AbstractNumericDomain

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.quinsoft.zeidon.domains.AbstractDomain
      • com.quinsoft.zeidon.domains.AbstractNumericDomain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Domain
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BigDecimalDomain, DoubleDomain, IntegerDomain, LongDomain

    public abstract class AbstractNumericDomain
extends AbstractDomain
    A Domain class so that all numeric domains can be grouped together.
    Author:
    DG
